block-handbooktext-eoven:
The electric oven completely replaces the furnace. It turns off automatically when the baking process is finished. No more burning!
Supports automatic loading and unloading via chutes.
block-handbooktext-heater:
A small heat source that can provide an additional temperature bonus to beds, fruit trees, regular trees (seeds and saplings), berry bushes, and hives in a greenhouse. One such heater at full power provides +5 degrees for 100 blocks of the greenhouse's internal volume. This volume also includes the beds themselves. The effects of heaters can be cumulative: you can view the total bonus on any of them. Bonus information is updated as soon as one of the plants recalculates.
Growing fruit trees won't become easier: you'll still have to follow all their growth cycles, so you'll need to use heaters to regulate the resulting temperature according to the tree's current stage. Cuttings must overwinter for several days at low temperatures, and then by gradually increasing the temperature, wait for them to take root (or not). After that, you can further increase the internal temperature to comfortable values for that particular tree, and it will begin to flower, bear fruit, etc. Each tree has its own temperature ranges, so be careful not to harm it. Once it has finished bearing fruit, you can forcibly put the tree back into dormancy. The cycle then repeats as many times as needed.
block-handbooktext-eheatcannon:
A powerful heat source that can provide an additional temperature bonus to beds, fruit trees, regular trees (seeds and saplings), berry bushes, and hives in a greenhouse. One such heater at full power provides +50 degrees for 100 blocks of the greenhouse's internal volume. This volume also includes the beds themselves. The effects of heaters can be cumulative: you can view the total bonus on any of them. Bonus information is updated as soon as one of the plants recalculates.
Growing fruit trees won't become easier: you'll still have to follow all their growth cycles, so you'll need to use heaters to regulate the resulting temperature according to the tree's current stage. Cuttings must overwinter for several days at low temperatures, and then by gradually increasing the temperature, wait for them to take root (or not). After that, you can further increase the internal temperature to comfortable values for that particular tree, and it will begin to flower, bear fruit, etc. Each tree has its own temperature ranges, so be careful not to harm it. Once it has finished bearing fruit, you can forcibly put the tree back into dormancy. The cycle then repeats as many times as needed.
block-handbooktext-elamp: A reliable light source that consumes electricity.
block-handbooktext-elamp_small: A compact light source that consumes electricity.
block-handbooktext-stolb_fonar: An electric lamp variant for street lighting.
block-handbooktext-ehorn:
The electric forge fully replaces the traditional forge.

Maximum heating temperature: 1100 °C.
block-handbooktext-charger:
The charging station allows recharging batteries and devices with built-in batteries.
Supports automatic loading and unloading via chutes.
block-handbooktext-estove:
The electric stove completely replaces a conventional campfire.
Supports automatic loading and unloading via chutes.

Maximum heating temperature of the stove: 1350 °C.
game:freezer-over-help: Open the door and place food to preserve it.
game:Put-into-1-items: Need at least 1 item for baking.
block-handbooktext-efreezer2:
The electric refrigerator allows food to be stored longer.

Storage slots: 6.
Food spoilage rate: 0.05x.
Can keep contents cold for up to 6 in-game hours after a power outage.
block-handbooktext-efence: A good defense against unwanted guests. Deals electric damage on contact. Doesn't consume energy, but must be connected to an electrical circuit to function.
block-handbooktext-ehotspringsgenerator: A generator that harnesses hot springs to produce electricity.
electricalprogressiveqol:hotsprings-near: Multiple Hot Springs Generators nearby, efficiency reduced
electricalprogressiveqol:hotsprings-not-: Must be surrounded by hot springs on all sides to function
